info.title: Football API v1.5
info.description: Test our API services using I/O Docs. Football API

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Returns a list of recognised aliases, which can be...

parameters.name: competitionId
parameters.description: The PA competition ID for the competition in question.
